321577.「近づけるのは ここまでだっぺよ。\n あれが 見えるだべか？:
This is as close we can get.
Ya see that, right?

321578.「でっけえハチの ばけもん……。\n あいつらが たちきりバチだ。\n おらの花:
Those huge bees...those are the notorious
Buzzbees. They're those annoying pests that
gone and ruined my flower field!

321579.「駆除を頼んだ なんでも屋のオーガたちも\n あいつに ボコボコにされて\n 今:
The Ogres we hired to get rid of 'em got
beat up pretty bad... They're hangin' on
for dear life...

321580.「そんくれえ やべえ害虫だっぺよ。\n 用心するに こしたことはねえ。:
Those blasted pests are real pain in the rear.
We'd best be careful.

321581.「おめえさが 捜してるっちゅう\n 迷子のお年寄りだけんど……見当たらねえな。\:
You said you're looking for someone who got
lost, but I don't see anyone...there's not a
soul in this flower field.

321582.老木の霊魂らしきものが\n花畑の中央で 眠りこけている。\nめざましハンドベルを:
The Old Tree Spirit seems to be sleeping
in the flower field. Use the Alarm Clock
Bell to wake it up?<yesno><close>

321583.「おんやぁ どうしただか？\n 花畑に 人影でも見つけただか？:
Eh? What's wrong? Did ya find someone in the
flower field?

321584.老木の霊魂らしきものが\n花畑の中央で 眠りこけている。\nめざましハンドベルを:
The Old Tree Spirit seems to be sleeping
in the flower field. Use the Alarm Clock
Bell to wake it up?<yesno><close>

321585.ここからでは 老木の霊魂に 音が届かない。\n近くで鳴らさないと 効果がないよう:
It seems you are too far away for the bell's
sound to reach the spirit. You'll have to move
in closer for it to work.

321586.「おおお…おめえさ！ なんてことするだ！\n たちきりバチに 気付かれっべ！:
H...hey! Whaddya think you're doing?!
You're gonna tip off those Buzzbees!

321588.たちきりバチを 駆除しなければ\n老木の霊魂のそばに 近づけないようだ。\nもう:
The Buzzbees will need to be exterminated if
you want to get closer to the Old Tree Spirit.
Speak with Hanakyu once more.

321589.「満開ですよ！ ポワン様！\n これで 春のお祭りを始められますね！:
It's in full bloom, Lady Treacle!
Now the Spring Festival can begin!

321590.「ええ。それも これも\n <pc>のおかげです。\n ありがとうございました。:
Yes...and it is all thanks to you,
<pc>. You have my dearest
thanks.

321591.「もっとも樹齢の長い この木が\n 花を咲かせる前に お祭りを始めてしまうのは\:
I was hesitant to begin the Spring Festival
before our most ancient tree blossomed
its flowers...

321592.「この時期になると どうしてか……\n 妖精の国の外から ふらりと訪問者が\n:
For some reason, at this time of year...
Visitors from afar come to visit Fairy Land.

321593.「いちばん目立つ この桜の老木が\n 花をつけぬままでは……外から来た者たちを\:
If our most conspicuous cherry blossom tree
hadn't bloomed its flowers...then our
outside visitors may have been disappointed.

321594.「ほかならぬ 私も 満開の桜を愛でつつ\n 外の世界から来た者と 語らう時間を\:
As for me...I always anticipate the cherry
blossoms going into full bloom, and being able
to chat with our visitors from the outside...

321595.「ああ……言っているそばから\n さっそく 訪問者が来たようです。:
Oh...speaking of, it seems we have another
visitor who's just arrived.

321596.「こんにちわ ポワンさまー！\n なんか 今年も 来ちゃったよ～！:
Hello, Miss Treacle!
I've come here for this year's festival, too!

321597.「まあ セラフィ。よく来てくれました。\n 今年も会えて うれしいです。:
Well, if it isn't Seraphi. I'm glad that you
could join us this year. I'm so happy to see
you.

321598.「ちょうど 桜が満開になり お祭りの準備を\n 進めようと していたところです。:
The cherry blossoms have just fully bloomed, so we were making preparations for the festival. It shouldn't be much longer until
it's ready to begin.

321600.「私はね 密林を探検してたら いつの間にか\n 妖精の国へ 迷い込んじゃったんだ:
I was exploring the dense jungle when I suddenly appeared here in Fairy Land... Last year, I think I was in the middle of
exploring the Pyramid when it happened...

321601.「妖精の国って 行こうと思っても\n 行ける場所じゃないから ホントに不思議！:
What a mysterious place Fairy Land is! It's
not somewhere you can get to easily!

321602.「それはそうと……スライム姿の\n <pc>さんも かわいい！\n でも なんで:
By the way, <pc>...you look so
cute as a Slime! But why a Slime,
though?

321603.「わあ！ かわいいスライム……\n じゃなくて あなたはヒトみたいね。:
Ahh! Such a cute Slime...
Well, actually...you just seem like a normal
person.

321604.「妖精の国を 訪れたヒトって\n スライムになっちゃうんだね！:
I guess that anyone who visits Fairy Land
gets turned into a Slime!

321605.「ホント かわいいなぁ……えへへ。\n 私は セラフィっていうの。よろしくね！:
It's so cute... Ehehe. I'm Seraphi. Nice to
meet you!

321606.「へえ！ あなたは <pc>さんて\n いうんだね。お祭りが終わるまで\n ここ:
Wow! So you're <pc>? I'll be here
until the festival's over, so let's have
fun together!

321607.「すべての桜が開花し 春のお祭りを\n 始められるように なったのは\n <pc:
All of the cherry blossoms are in bloom, and
it's thanks to you that the Spring Festival
can finally begin.

321608.「こちらに お礼を用意しましたので\n どうぞ お受け取りください。:
I have prepared this as a gift for you.
Please accept it.

321609.ベラの指揮のもと 祭りの準備が進められ\nついに 春の祭りが 始まった！:
Under Honey's leadership, preparations were
well underway. At long last, the Spring
Festival had begun!

321976.「<pc>さんだよね？\n こんなとこで 会えるなんて 意外！！:
<pc>, is that you?
I never thought I'd see you here!!
